snippet: A new report from United Nations experts accuses exiled allies of Ivory Coast’s former president of trying to recruit Islamist rebels who took control of the northern half of Mali.
lead_paragraph: A new report from United Nations experts accuses exiled allies of Ivory Coast’s former president of trying to recruit Islamist rebels who took control of the northern half of Mali.

headline.main: Ivory Coast: U.N. Report Says Ex-President’s Allies Reach Out to Islamists
headline.print_headline: Ivory Coast: U.N. Report Says Ex-President’s Allies Reach Out to Islamists
